questions: What is Ozone ? [Board Term II, Set (2022), 2012]
answers: Ozone is a molecule formed by three atoms of oxygen, which shields the surface of the earth from ultraviolet radiations.

questions: State the essential function performed by Ozone at the higher levels of the atmosphere.
answers: It shields the surface of the earth from ultraviolet (UV) radiation from the sun. ()

questions: Why is ozone layer getting depleted at the higher levels of the atmosphere ?
answers: Ozone layer is getting depleted at the higher levels of the atmosphere due to effect of chlorofluorocarbons (CFCs) which are used as refrigerants and in fire extinguishers.

questions: Name the chemical compound which depletes ozone layer.
Why is excessive use of CFCs a cause of concern?
answers: When CFC’S reach upper layers of the atmosphere, they cause depletion of ozone layer, and allow harmful UV radiations to reach the surface of the earth to create health hazards.

questions: The depletion of ozone layer is a cause of concern. Why ?
answers: Ultraviolet rays from the sun penetrate down the earth and cause health hazards/skin cancer in human being.  1

questions: How is ozone formed in the upper part of the atmosphere of the earth ?
answers: Ozone at higher level of atmosphere is a product of UV radiation acting on oxygen (O2) molecule.

questions: What is the function of ozone in the upper atmosphere ?
answers: Ozone layer protects the earth from harmful radiations like high energy ultraviolet radiations from passing through it.
